page.title: 17MUSIC FESTIVAL
page.content: {EVENTS(MUSIC FESTIVAL) The{music festival}was formed in 1971.The accordian club started it,and at first only a few came.The{festival was really supposed to make people remember the old ballads. The{festival}starts on the 28th of June and finishs on the 30th.The first day,Friday starts with an opening concert,followed by the first night dance,later on at night there are two ceilidhs. Saturday is the{competion {day }with{competions}like accordians,ballads,traditional singing,fiddles and recorders.There is also a competion for the{Border pipes the only competion for{Border pipes}in the world.They are a cross between the {Scottish Bag pipes}and the {Northumbrian pipes,}but you pump air into them with a little bag placed under your arm.
